tiles.name: storm_king_peak
tiles.description: The highest peak in the Whispering Crags, perpetually wreathed in storm clouds. Legend says the Storm Kings once communed with the elements here.

tiles.name: zephyrs_hidden_cave
tiles.description: Hidden halfway up Storm King Peak, Zephyr's cave laboratory is filled with arcane equipment and weather-worn maps.

tiles.name: crag_wind_tunnel
tiles.description: A narrow pass through the Crags, known for its powerful winds and echoing whispers. Difficult passage even in good weather.

tiles.name: lightning_ravaged_forest
tiles.description: A charred forest valley, scarred by frequent lightning strikes. The wood is brittle and the air crackles with residual energy.

tiles.name: forgotten_storm_altar
tiles.description: An ancient altar carved into the rock face, long abandoned but still radiating a faint elemental power. Once used in storm rituals.

tiles.name: skybreak_vista_plateau
tiles.description: A plateau offering a panoramic view, frequently experiencing clear skies even when the Crags are storm-ridden. A point of relative calm.

tiles.name: eagle_nest_ridge
tiles.description: A rocky ridge, home to a colony of giant eagles. The eagles are territorial and protective of their nests.

tiles.name: shattered_staff_gully
tiles.description: A deep gully where, according to local legend, a shard of the Lightning Staff once landed. Unstable terrain and strange energies.

tiles.name: hermetic_order_ruins
tiles.description: The crumbling ruins of the hermetic order's monastery, where Zephyr was raised. A place of lost knowledge and forgotten magic.

tiles.name: storm_watch_outpost
tiles.description: A small watchtower on the edge of the Crags, used to monitor approaching storms. Now abandoned and in disrepair.

tiles.name: westwind_trade_route
tiles.description: A winding trade route skirting the western edge of the Whispering Crags, vital for commerce despite the weather dangers.

tiles.name: thunderhead_river_source
tiles.description: The headwaters of the Thunderhead River, fed by snowmelt and frequent thunderstorms. Prone to flash floods.

tiles.name: amber_fields_farmlands
tiles.description: Fertile farmland watered by the Thunderhead River, producing amber-colored grains. The fields are vulnerable to hail and wind.

tiles.name: cloudhaven_village_outskirts
tiles.description: The humble outer fields of the village that Zephyr originated from.

tiles.name: cloudhaven_village_center
tiles.description: The humble town center of Zephyr's home, the village of Cloudhaven, with simple buildings and a central well.

tiles.name: old_mill_district
tiles.description: Near Cloudhaven, an overgrown but crucial mill that grinds the amber grain.

tiles.name: riverbend_bridge
tiles.description: A sturdy stone bridge crossing the Thunderhead River, connecting Cloudhaven and the main trade road.

tiles.name: eastwood_lumber_camp
tiles.description: A lumber camp exploiting the forests east of the Crags. A vital resource but also a source of deforestation.

tiles.name: iron_mine_quarry
tiles.description: An active iron mine gouged into the mountainside. Provides valuable ore but also scarring the landscape.

tiles.name: blackrock_smelting_furnaces
tiles.description: A cluster of smelting furnaces processing the iron ore. Polluted air and a constant glow.

tiles.name: windswept_graveyard
tiles.description: An old graveyard located on a windswept hill, overlooking Cloudhaven and the surrounding valley. Many headstones are weathered and worn.

tiles.name: stone_quarry_site
tiles.description: An abandoned stone quarry where the stones to build the village were taken from.

tiles.name: lone_shepherds_watchtower
tiles.description: A dilapidated watchtower where shepherds kept an eye on the surrounding flocks.

tiles.name: wildflower_meadow
tiles.description: A meadow covered in an array of wildflowers, located near the base of the Whispering Crags.

tiles.name: overgrown_trail
tiles.description: A trail covered in weeds and shrubs that leads towards the Whispering Crags.

tiles.name: ancient_stone_monolith
tiles.description: An ancient stone monolith standing in the middle of a field, its origin and purpose unknown.

tiles.name: campsite_remnants
tiles.description: The remnants of an old campsite, indicating that travelers once frequented this area.

tiles.name: rocky_outcrop
tiles.description: A rocky outcrop overlooking the valley, providing a vantage point to spot distant storms.

tiles.name: dense_thicket
tiles.description: A dense thicket of trees and bushes, making it difficult to traverse.

tiles.name: abandoned_farmstead
tiles.description: An abandoned farmstead with a dilapidated house and overgrown fields.

tiles.name: merchants_way_crossroads
tiles.description: A major crossroads where merchants from neighboring lands meet to trade their wares.

tiles.name: caravan_resting_grounds
tiles.description: Resting grounds for caravans, offering basic amenities and protection.

tiles.name: northgate_town_walls
tiles.description: Town walls protecting the northern entrance from external threats.

tiles.name: market_square_merchants_way
tiles.description: The bustling market square where merchants display and sell their goods.

tiles.name: cobblestone_street_shops
tiles.description: A cobblestone street lined with shops, selling everything from textiles to tools.

tiles.name: grand_guildhall_merchants_way
tiles.description: The impressive guildhall where merchants and artisans gather to discuss trade and regulations.

tiles.name: town_guard_barracks
tiles.description: Barracks housing the town guard responsible for maintaining law and order.

tiles.name: healing_temple
tiles.description: A healing temple dedicated to the art of medicine and divine intervention.

tiles.name: well_fountain
tiles.description: A peaceful place in the town's center, surrounded by greenery.

tiles.name: southgate_guardhouse
tiles.description: A heavily fortified southgate guardhouse.

tiles.name: merchants_way_gate
tiles.description: A huge gate on merchants' way.

tiles.name: south_farm_land
tiles.description: The huge lands to the south where most farmers of merchant's way reside.

tiles.name: lone_house_near_farms
tiles.description: A lone house near a major farming plot.

tiles.name: farming_path_entrance
tiles.description: The entrance path to the farming lands south.

tiles.name: lake_serene_waters
tiles.description: A huge lake that provides most of merchant's way drinking water.

tiles.name: fishing_huts_lakeside
tiles.description: Small fishing huts along the lake.

tiles.name: path_along_lake
tiles.description: A path along the east lake-side.

tiles.name: small_lake_entrance
tiles.description: A small entrance where lake visitors can visit.

tiles.name: forest_trail
tiles.description: A dense, mostly-unvisited forest trail.

tiles.name: cave_entrance
tiles.description: A dark cave where wild beasts are often said to reside.

tiles.name: isolated_dwelling_near_crags
tiles.description: A lone dwelling nestled near the base of the Whispering Crags.

tiles.name: cragside_stream_crossing
tiles.description: A shallow stream flowing down the slopes of the Crags.

tiles.name: shadowfen_marsh
tiles.description: A murky marshland shrouded in mist.

tiles.name: mistwood_grove
tiles.description: A grove of ancient trees, perpetually shrouded in mist.

tiles.name: ruined_circle_of_stones
tiles.description: The remains of a circle of standing stones, their purpose long forgotten.

tiles.name: hermit_shack
tiles.description: A small, secluded shack inhabited by a reclusive hermit.

tiles.name: blackfeather_hunting_grounds
tiles.description: The hunting grounds of the reclusive Blackfeather Clan.

tiles.name: ominous_shadowed_gulch
tiles.description: A dark and foreboding gulch, rumored to be haunted.

tiles.name: ravens_perch
tiles.description: A rocky outcrop where ravens gather, watching the landscape below.

tiles.name: echoing_canyon
tiles.description: A narrow canyon where sounds reverberate and amplify.

tiles.name: stone_ridge_lookout
tiles.description: A high stone ridge offering a panoramic view of the surrounding lands.

tiles.name: crag_shadow_path
tiles.description: A treacherous path winding through the shadow of the Crags.

tiles.name: withered_bog
tiles.description: A desolate bog, its plant life withered and decayed.

tiles.name: phantom_falls
tiles.description: A waterfall that appears and disappears with the shifting mists.

tiles.name: forgotten_warriors_burial_ground
tiles.description: The burial ground of fallen warriors, their identities lost to time.

tiles.name: old_hunters_cabin
tiles.description: The run-down cabin where old hunters reside.

tiles.name: broken_watchers_gate
tiles.description: The broken watcher's gate where an observer kept watch.

tiles.name: shady_dealers_den
tiles.description: A shady dealer's den hidden in the forest.

tiles.name: northmost_point_lake
tiles.description: The lake's northmost point.

tiles.name: fishing_contest_spot
tiles.description: A secluded lakeside fishing contest spot.

tiles.name: trading_post_north
tiles.description: The north trading post where deals are usually made.

tiles.name: bandit_hideout
tiles.description: A bandit hideout deep in the woods.

tiles.name: treasure_cache
tiles.description: A treasure cache buried underground.

tiles.name: travelers_stop_point
tiles.description: A resting stop for travels.

tiles.name: mining_guild_post
tiles.description: The local mining guild post.

tiles.name: old_mining_grounds
tiles.description: The local mining grounds.

tiles.name: deep_forest_stream
tiles.description: The deep forest stream.

tiles.name: north_river
tiles.description: The north river that feeds off the lake.

tiles.name: fishermans_trail
tiles.description: The fisherman's trail.

tiles.name: abandoned_hunters_trail
tiles.description: Abandoned hunter's trail.

tiles.name: trade_bridge
tiles.description: A small bridge that traders always cross.

tiles.name: forest_tunnel_path
tiles.description: A forest path.

tiles.name: forest_hunters_path
tiles.description: Forest hunter's path.

tiles.name: ruined_guard_tower
tiles.description: An abandoned guard tower.

tiles.name: northgate_entrance
tiles.description: A heavily guarded entrance.

tiles.name: secret_river_passage
tiles.description: A secret river passage.

tiles.name: lake_tunnel_passage
tiles.description: A tunnel to enter the lake.

tiles.name: farmers_main_stop
tiles.description: The farmer's main stop.

tiles.name: trading_stop
tiles.description: Where traders conduct their business.

tiles.name: miners_camp
tiles.description: Local miners camp.

tiles.name: lumber_outpost
tiles.description: Local lumber outpost

tiles.name: north_mountain_passage
tiles.description: Where merchants walk along the steep mountains.

tiles.name: secret_meeting_ground
tiles.description: A secluded mountain where a secret meeting is held.

tiles.name: northgate_passage
tiles.description: A gate to passage near the mountains.

tiles.name: cave_passage
tiles.description: A cave that leads passage.

tiles.name: hidden_cave_area
tiles.description: A hidden area where Zephyr resided, a long time ago.

tiles.name: farmers_route
tiles.description: A route farmers use to enter farmlands.

tiles.name: hunters_area
tiles.description: An area where hunters reside.

tiles.name: lumber_area
tiles.description: An area that lumber camps usually traverse.

tiles.name: miners_path
tiles.description: Path miners follow.
